snippet: For chefs and others whose work requires knives or other dangerous objects, business trips can be prone to problems without proper planning.
abstract: For chefs and others whose work requires knives or other dangerous objects, airline business trips can be prone to problems without proper planning; some travelers say airport security checkpoints can be inconsistent on checking scissors and knives.
lead_paragraph: For chefs and others whose work requires knives or other dangerous objects, business trips can be prone to problems without proper planning.

headline.seo: When Your Job Means Traveling With Sharp Objects
